data.description: The developing fluid that Krytern uses to process old photographs mutates and the photographs come alive. The Red Dwarf crew find they can go into the photograph, and Lister finds that the photographs allows them to go back in time and he plans on changing history so that he doesn't end up marooned in deep space.                Written byDaniel Williamson

donation.message: Please, donate to keep this service alive and help its further development
